verses.verse: "As for you, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> take<WH3947> a sharp<WH2299> sword;<WH2719> take<WH3947> and use<WH5674> it [as] a barber's razor<WH8593> on your head<WH7218> and beard.<WH2206> Then take<WH3947> scales<WH3976> for weighing<WH4948> and divide<WH2505> the hair.

"One<WH7992> third<WH7992> you shall burn<WH1197> in the fire<WH217> at the center<WH8432> of the city,<WH5892> when the days<WH3117> of the siege<WH4692> are completed.<WH4390> Then you shall take<WH3947> one<WH7992> third<WH7992> and strike<WH5221> [it] with the sword<WH2719> all<WH5439> around<WH5439> the city, and one<WH7992> third<WH7992> you shall scatter<WH2219> to the wind;<WH7307> and I will unsheathe<WH9553> a sword<WH2719> behind<WH310> them.

"And take<WH3947> again<WH5750> some<WH4480> of them and throw<WH7993> them into the fire,<WH784> and burn<WH8313> them in the fire;<WH784> from it a fire<WH784> will spread<WH3318> to all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>
"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'This<WH384> is Jerusalem;<WH3389> I have set<WH7760> her at the center<WH8432> of the nations,<WH1471> with lands<WH776> around<WH5439> her.

'But she has rebelled<WH4784> against<WH854> My ordinances<WH4941> more<WH4480> wickedly<WH7564> than<WH4480> the nations<WH1471> and against<WH854> My statutes<WH2708> more<WH4480> than<WH4480> the lands<WH776> which<WH834> surround<WH5439> her; for they have rejected<WH3988> My ordinances<WH4941> and have not walked<WH1980> in My statutes.<WH2708>'

"Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'Because<WH3282> you have more<WH4480> turmoil<WH9098> than<WH4480> the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> surround<WH5439> you, and have not walked<WH1980> in My statutes,<WH2708> nor<WH3808> observed<WH6213> My ordinances,<WH4941> nor<WH3808> observed<WH6213> the ordinances<WH4941> of the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> surround<WH5439> you,'

therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'Behold,<WH2009> I, even<WH1571> I, am against<WH5921> you, and I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH4941> among<WH8432> you in the sight<WH5869> of the nations.<WH1471>

'And because<WH3282> of all<WH3605> your abominations,<WH8441> I will do<WH6213> among you what<WH834> I have not done,<WH6213> and the like<WH3644> of which<WH834> I will never<WH3808> do<WH6213> again.<WH5750>

'Therefore,<WH3651> fathers will eat<WH1> [their] sons<WH398> among<WH1121> you, and sons<WH8432> will eat<WH1121> their fathers; for I will execute<WH398> judgments<WH1> on you, and scatter<WH6213> all<WH8201> your remnant<WH2219> to every<WH3605> wind.<WH7611>

'So<WH3651> as I live,<WH2416>' declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'surely,<WH518> <WH3808> because<WH3282> you have defiled<WH2930> My sanctuary<WH4720> with all<WH3605> your detestable<WH8251> idols<WH8251> and with all<WH3605> your abominations,<WH8441> therefore I will also<WH1571> withdraw,<WH1639> and My eye<WH5869> shall have<WH2347> no<WH3808> pity<WH2347> and I will not spare.<WH2550>

'One<WH7992> third<WH7992> of you will die<WH4191> by plague<WH1698> or be consumed<WH3615> by famine<WH7458> among<WH8432> you, one<WH7992> third<WH7992> will fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719> around<WH5439> you, and one<WH7992> third<WH7992> I will scatter<WH2219> to every<WH3605> wind,<WH7307> and I will unsheathe<WH9553> a sword<WH2719> behind<WH310> them.

'Thus My anger<WH639> will be spent,<WH3615> and I will satisfy<WH5117> My wrath<WH2534> on them, and I shall be appeased;<WH5162> then they will know<WH3045> that I, the Lord,<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> in My zeal<WH7068> when I have spent<WH3615> My wrath<WH2534> upon them.
'Moreover, I will make<WH5414> you a desolation<WH2723> and a reproach<WH2781> among the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> surround<WH5439> you, in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> who pass<WH5674> by.

'So it will be a reproach,<WH2781> a reviling,<WH1422> a warning<WH4148> and an object<WH4923> of horror<WH4923> to the nations<WH1471> who<WH834> surround<WH5439> you, when I execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> against you in anger,<WH639> wrath,<WH2534> and raging<WH2534> rebukes.<WH9640> I, the Lord,<WH3068> have spoken.<WH1696>

'When I send<WH7971> against them the deadly<WH7451> arrows<WH2671> of famine<WH7458> which<WH834> were for the destruction<WH7843> of those whom<WH834> I shall send<WH7971> to destroy<WH7843> you, then I shall also intensify<WH3254> the famine<WH7458> upon you, and break<WH7665> the staff<WH4294> of bread.<WH3899>

'Moreover, I will send<WH7971> on you famine<WH7458> and wild<WH7451> beasts,<WH9130> and they will bereave<WH7921> you of children;<WH7921> plague<WH1698> and bloodshed<WH1818> also will pass<WH5674> through you, and I will bring<WH935> the sword<WH2719> on you. I, the Lord,<WH3068> have spoken.<WH1696>' "
